title: (x) Light grotesque in SVA brochure ca 1999 - Basic Commercial (Akzidenz-Grotesk) {Lex (Yves)}
content:
From an SVA brochure ca 1999.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215025009im_/http:/typophile.com/files/identify_5299.gif)

 [‹ Bear Family Records light grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215025009/http:/typophile.com/node/40075 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Red Bull Creativity Contest website typography - FF Meta {Marc O, Rainer} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215025009/http:/typophile.com/node/40030 "Go to next forum topic")
author: finn

comments.content: Sorry I misplaced it the first time.
Yep, that’s it. The y and P are unmistakeable.
